name: Blossoming Season
description:
Made for the the  The Wholesome Jam.

Play as Blossom, a girl travelling between seasons to help her friends.  Complete tasks and battle  food based enimies.    If you help your friends enough they'll join you and help you unlock new parts of the maps and more seasons, fields and friends to help.  If you run out of items or  are low on health, you can return home and rest or get items from the kitchen.

This is a causual turn based RPG.

Controls Keyboard 

Arrow keys -  Movement

Z - Select

X- Menu / Cancel

Mouse

Left click - move to point / select

Right click - Menu/ Cancel

Credits

Game  Engine and RTP Assets - RPG Maker MV

Credits Plugin - SumRndmDde

Menu Plugin - Mjshi
